overview: Some of our most gorgeous Peach Girls have spent the day shopping for lingerie and they can't wait to model their sexy new undergarments just for you. Join Victoria Red in the living room where she'll show off her sexy black garter set or find out why Holly Morgan isn't as innocent as she looks when she strips down to her unmentionable's and then some. Then find out what really happens at a Peach Girl over with Samantha Ryan, Lux Kassidy and Justine Jolie.
title: Intimate Apparel
